Description: Auth Louis Vuitton Cobalt Calf Leather Sophia Coppola MM Bag Purse Satchel EUC  THANK YOU FOR LOOKING! Up for your consideration Authentic Louis Vuitton Sophia Coppola MM Satchel Handbag in TIMELESS & CLASSIC Cobalt Calf Leather. This is one of the LV Leather Collection that will never go out of style! This bag was designed by Sophia Coppola and it features Luxurious Soft Textured High End Leather! Absolutely HIGH END & Luxurious! This is a great additon to any wardrobe and perfect for travel, office, business and MORE! This is SOLD OUT & DISCONTINUED and no longer in production. Extremely Rare and Hard to find online especially in this excellent used condition. This is another must have Louis Vuitton bag you will surely love to have, that's for sure! Please see photos for other details. Valued over $5000 with Tax. This is PRELOVED and in excellent used condition. The bag shows general signs of wear but overall still in wonderful condition! These are typical wear such as worn spots on bottom edges (pics #9 & #10) and looks to be scratches on one of the handles (pic #11). Please see photos and you will be the judge if these typical wear takes away the beauty from this bag.  The interior is clean and odor free! Overall, as you can see bag is still in wonderful condition with lots of life left in it so I am sure you won't be disappointed.  But if those wear bothers you, this bag is not for you. I have taken a lot of photos on every detail and angle of the bag so you can see it's an Authentic LV bag. It's absolutely BEAUTIFUL and oozing with class and sophistication. Perfect for business or for everyday use. This is a nice treat for someone special especially for ladies who enjoy carrying large size bags. It measures approximately 14L x 9H x 7.5W with 4.5" handle drop and 12" strap drop. Does not come with dustbag. I misplaced it and I couldn't find it. As always GUARANTEED 100% Authentic!
